name: 3-min keto bread
instructions:
1)Mix almond flour and paking powder in bread size recipient
2)Add oil and egg
3)Beat it like you are making an omelette
4)Microwave on high for 90 seconds

Note: I usually cut the bread and fill it with cheese and turkey and put it on a frying pan
additionalInfo: Best solution for when you are missing a nice bread. It is super fast to make and you can use you favorite filling. I usually do it for breakfast. Yummy!
